body:
![Galaxy Nexus](http://spacecowboy.github.com/NotePad/images/phonelist.png)

**NoNonsense Notes** is a app where you can save short notes or tasks. It tries to be as simple as possible without sacrificing functionality.

![Nexus 7](http://spacecowboy.github.com/NotePad/images/editor7.png)

It keeps your stuff safe in the cloud by syncing with [Google Tasks](http://www.gmail.com/tasks). This way, your notes are always up to date across all your devices.

![Nexus 7](http://spacecowboy.github.com/NotePad/images/phonedarklist.png)

You can switch between different themes and looks.
The settings offers a whole range of customization. Don't care for the check boxes in the list? Hide them!

![Nexus 7](http://spacecowboy.github.com/NotePad/images/phoneoptions.png)

Perhaps the most important thing of all is that the app is **free** and **open source**. Download the installer straight from GitHub, or get it from Google Play.
name: NoNonsense Notes
tagline: Because writing short notes on your mobile device should be easy, free, synchronized and open source.
